author: farhan
title: S'PORE GIRL: WHY DO PEOPLE STARE AT MY LEGS WHEN I WEAR SHORT SKIRTS OR SHORTS
text:
S'PORE GIRL: WHY DO PEOPLE STARE AT MY LEGS WHEN I WEAR SHORT SKIRTS OR SHORTS   
Dear Editors, Advertisement 
I'm a girl who rarely wears skirts/shorts/dresses above the knee. And that's because when I do, I notice people stare at my legs and it makes me really uncomfortable. 
When I wear a tank top and shorts, somehow it seems as if I'm showing too much skin and kind of get creepy stares, but other girls can do it and get away with it. 
How do you all do it without getting creepy stares from people. Am i being too self conscious? 
Sarah A.S.S. Contributor Editor's Note: 
If not, why not give us a 'Like' ? Filed Under:
